movies.title: Around the World in Eighty Days
movies.plot: Based on the famous book by Jules Verne the movie follows Phileas Fogg on his journey around the world. Which has to be completed within 80 days, a very short period for those days.

events.title: Phileas Fogg leaves London to travel around the world
